item.title: 孙正义向台积电和特朗普团队推介价值 1 万亿美元的美国人工智能中心
item.description: 软银集团创始人孙正义正寻求与台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. founder Masayoshi Son is seeking to team up with Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. to realize what could be his biggest bet yet — a trillion-dollar industrial complex in Arizona to build robots and artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 中国 5 月稀土永磁出口下滑，尤其是对美国的出口
item.description: 受与华盛顿的贸易战影响，5 月份中国稀土永磁出口进一步下滑，尤其是对美国的出口急剧下降。【原文：Chinese exports of rare earth magnets slumped further in May, with shipments to the US showing an especially steep drop due to the trade war with Washington.】

item.title: 伊朗危机加剧，中国创纪录的石油库存提供缓冲
item.description: 中国是伊朗原油的最大进口国，中国的炼油企业目前对中东原油供应中断的可能性并不担心，因为中国拥有创纪录的原油库存，可以提供暂时的缓冲。【原文：Oil refiners in China — the largest takers of Iranian crude — are unfazed for now about the possibility of interruptions to Middle Eastern supplies given the nation has a record stockpile that provides a temporary buffer.】

item.title: NTT 163 亿美元收购人工智能公司交易获支持
item.description: 日本电信电话公司（Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp.）表示，它已获得足够多的竞标来收购 NTT Data Group Corp.，这笔价值 2.37 万亿日元（约合 163 亿美元）的交易有望推动其人工智能雄心，并简化公司结构。【原文：Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp. said it has secured enough bids to buy NTT Data Group Corp., with the deal worth ¥2.37 trillion ($16.3 billion) expected to boost its AI ambitions and simplify the corporate structure.】

item.title: 美国汽车协会（AAA）称，油价下跌将促使七夕节公路旅行人数创下新高
item.description: 在四年来最便宜汽油的助推下，预计将有创纪录数量的美国司机在下周末开始的七月四日假期上路。【原文：A record number of US drivers are expected to hit the road for the July Fourth holiday period starting next weekend, helped by the cheapest gasoline in four years.】

item.title: 伊朗劫持家庭安全摄像头在以色列境内进行间谍活动
item.description: 伊朗正在利用以色列的私人监控摄像头来收集有关其对手的实时情报，这暴露了该设备在其他全球冲突中经常出现的问题。【原文：Iran is tapping into private security cameras in Israel to gather real-time intelligence about its adversary, exposing a recurrent problem with the devices that has emerged in other global conflicts.】

item.title: 桑切斯反对 5%的目标，使北约的特朗普计划面临风险
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）面临的问题越来越多，有可能蔓延到下周的北约峰会，并可能给欧盟其他国家带来严重后果。【原文：The problems piling up for Primer Minister Pedro Sanchez in Spain are threatening to spill into next week’s NATO summit, with potentially drastic consequences for the rest of the European Union.】

item.title: 花旗集团称，如果霍尔木兹海峡关闭，石油价格可能飙升至 90 美元
item.description: 花旗集团称，如果霍尔木兹海峡关闭，布伦特原油可能跃升至每桶 90 美元左右。【原文：Brent crude could jump to around $90 a barrel if the Strait of Hormuz is closed, according to Citigroup Inc., which added that a prolonged halt to shipping through the crucial waterway would be unlikely.】

item.title: 新世界接近达成再融资协议，债券价格飙升
item.description: 新世界发展有限公司的美元债券有望创下本月最高水平，因为该公司即将完成一项关键的贷款再融资交易。【原文：New World Development Co.’s dollar bonds are poised to hit their highest levels this month as the company closes in on a crucial loan refinancing deal.】

item.title: 菲律宾将在比索疲软威胁价格时介入
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，如果比索下跌威胁到通货膨胀，当局准备对外汇市场进行更有力的干预。【原文：Philippine central bank Governor Eli Remolona said authorities are prepared to intervene more strongly in the foreign-exchange market should the decline in the peso threaten inflation.】

item.title: 政治困境有可能使泰国经济更深地陷入困境
item.description: 泰国突然陷入一场新的政治危机，威胁到已经濒临技术性衰退并准备应对全球贸易战影响的经济。【原文：Thailand’s sudden descent into a new political crisis threatens an economy that’s already on the brink of a technical recession and bracing for the impact of the global trade war.】

item.title: 韩国对美顺差创新高为关税谈判增添压力
item.description: 去年，韩国对美国的经常项目顺差飙升至历史新高，这凸显了韩国总统李在明在寻求与唐纳德-特朗普达成贸易协议时所面临的挑战。【原文：South Korea’s current account surplus with the US surged to a record high last year, highlighting the challenge President Lee Jae Myung faces as he seeks to secure a trade deal with Donald Trump.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称香港房地产业正在触底反弹
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，香港住宅物业市场在经历了长达七年的低迷期后有望复苏。【原文：Hong Kong’s residential property market is poised for a recovery after enduring a seven-year downturn, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 特姆公司在美国的销售因关税和广告支出削减而连续亏损
item.description: Temu在美国的销售额继续出现两位数的下滑，原因是该在线市场削减了广告支出，而自4月份以来关税导致的产品价格上涨又加剧了销售下滑。【原文：Temu continued to suffer double-digit sales drop in the US as the online marketplace cut spending on advertising, adding to a slump caused by tariff-induced hike in product prices since April.】

item.title: 赤泽说：日本不会在美国贸易谈判中纠结于 7 月 9 日
item.description: 日本正在与美国进行贸易谈判，东京的最高谈判代表表示，日本不会纠结于即将到来的所谓互惠关税上升日期，这表明亚洲国家已为谈判可能拖延做好准备。【原文：Japan won’t fixate on the looming date that could see so-called reciprocal tariffs rise in its ongoing trade negotiations with the US, Tokyo’s top negotiator said, signaling the Asian nation stands ready for the possibility that the talks will drag on.】

item.title: 交易雨不断，但印度市场仍未出现欣喜若狂的迹象
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 摩根士丹利资本国际(MSCI)发出信号：韩国还需努力才能赢得升级
item.description: 全球指数提供商摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：Global index provider MSCI Inc. signaled that South Korea’s bid to secure an upgrade to developed-market status continues to face several impediments, even as it lauded efforts by the nation’s authorities to improve market access and implement currency reforms.】

item.title: 中国对盲盒玩具的警告导致流行超市股价暴跌
item.description: 在中国国家媒体发表评论，呼吁对提供 "盲卡 "和 "神秘盒 "的企业实施更严格的监管之后，大卖场国际集团有限公司在香港的股价下滑。【原文：Pop Mart International Group Ltd. shares slid in Hong Kong after a Chinese state media commentary called for stricter regulation of businesses offering “blind cards” and “mystery boxes.”】

item.title: 避险需求减弱，黄金迎来三周来首次下跌
item.description: 中东地缘政治紧张局势的缓和削弱了避险需求，而美联储的通胀预警又提高了降息次数减少的可能性，黄金因此出现了三周以来的首次下跌。【原文：Gold headed for its first weekly drop in three as easing geopolitical tension in the Middle East sapped haven demand and a Federal Reserve inflation warning raised the prospect of fewer rate cuts.】

item.title: 打破中国降价脚本，腾讯音乐股价翻番
item.description: 对中国无情的价格竞争感到厌倦的中国科技投资者，可以将目光投向一个正朝着相反方向蓬勃发展的领域：在线音乐。【原文：China tech investors weary of the nation’s relentless price competition can look to one pocket that’s thriving by moving in the opposite direction: online music.】

item.title: 富达基金押注中型企业 称关税最坏影响已过
item.description: 富达国际（Fidelity International）的一位基金经理表示，金融市场已经看到了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关税威胁的最坏影响，随着前景的改善，中型企业股票将成为具有吸引力的买点。【原文：Financial markets have seen the worst of Donald Trump’s tariff threats, helping make midcap stocks an attractive buy as the outlook improves, according to a Fidelity International money manager.】

item.title: 高股息 ETF 遭拒后，台积电股价落后于小同行联电
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s stock is lagging smaller rival United Microelectronics Corp. after being brushed aside by some of Taiwan’s biggest yield-focused exchange-traded funds.】

item.title: 大选前日本物价创两年来最大涨幅
item.description: 日本首相石破茂正在为夏季大选做准备，日本央行也在考虑日本的物价走势，在此背景下，日本关键的消费者通胀指标加速上升，创下两年来的新高。【原文：Japan’s key consumer inflation measure accelerated to a fresh two-year high as Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba gears up for a summer election and the Bank of Japan mulls the country’s price trajectory.】

item.title: 特朗普考虑打击伊朗，石油将迎来第三周上涨
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将在两周内决定是否打击伊朗，石油有望实现第三周上涨。【原文：Oil was on track for a third weekly gain, with President Donald Trump set to decide within two weeks whether to strike Iran.】

item.title: 英国消费者信心指数上升，延续 "脆弱 "反弹势头
item.description: 一项调查显示，英国消费者的信心连续第二个月增强，延续了因中东战争和油价上涨给经济前景蒙上阴影而面临脱轨风险的反弹势头。【原文：The confidence of UK consumers improved for a second straight month, a survey found, extending a rebound that’s at risk of being derailed as war in the Middle East and higher oil prices cloud the economic outlook.】

item.title: 恒大巨头前妻在公司沉沦之际斥资数百万购房
item.description: 在中国恒大集团拖欠贷款九个月后，该集团主席的前妻在伦敦花费数百万美元购买豪华公寓。【原文：The ex-wife of China Evergrande Group’s chairman spent millions on luxury apartments in London, nine months after the developer defaulted on its loans.】

item.title: 澳大利亚青少年社交媒体禁令在科技审判后渐行渐近
item.description: 澳大利亚在世界上首次对 16 岁以下青少年实施社交媒体禁令，因为一项重要试验发现，检查用户年龄在技术上是可行的，而且可以整合到现有服务中。【原文：Australia’s world-first social media ban for under-16s moved closer to implementation after a key trial found that checking a user’s age is technologically possible and can be integrated into existing services.】

item.title: 习近平的巨型铁矿石交易商正在撼动价值 1300 亿美元的市场
item.description: 一家中国政府经营的贸易商在成立仅三年后，就已成为中国价值 1300 亿美元的铁矿石进口市场中的最大力量。【原文：Just three years after its founding, a Chinese government-run trader has become the single biggest force in the country’s $130 billion market for iron ore imports.】

item.title: 特朗普考虑打击伊朗，美国期货下滑：市场综述
item.description: 美国股市期货周五下跌，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统正在权衡是否在军事上支持以色列与伊朗的冲突。【原文：US equity futures dropped on Friday as President Donald Trump weighs whether to back Israel militarily in its conflict with Iran.】

item.title: JD.com 亿万富翁的病毒式噱头重燃中国送餐员之争
item.description: 四月一个异常温暖的傍晚，刘强东和其他外卖送餐员一起，在北京车水马龙的街道上开着摩托车，然后亲自把餐单递给惊喜的顾客。当晚晚些时候，在麻辣火锅和冰镇啤酒的陪伴下，这位 JD.com 公司创始人欢迎来自两家竞争对手外卖公司的一对骑手加入他的公司。【原文：One unusually warm evening in April, Richard Liu revved his scooter through Beijing’s traffic-snarled streets alongside other delivery workers, and then personally handed food orders to surprised customers. Later that night, over spicy hotpot and ice-cold beer, the JD.com Inc. founder welcomed a pair of riders from two rival delivery firms to his company.】
